title: How DeCC Unlocks the Power of Web3
description: Decentralized confidential computing (DeCC, pronounced Dee-See-See) is the crucial element enabling and securing practical decentralized applications.

title: Bitcoin set for the worst weekend since August 2023
description: Bitcoin is currently facing its worst week since August as demand for exchange-traded funds (ETFs) linked to the cryptocurrency has faltered. The price of Bitcoin has declined by more than 10% from its recent all-time high amid moderating appetite for spot Bitcoin ETFs.  This downturn comes as dedicated US ETF demand dries up, prompting concerns […]

title: What does Worldcoin plan to achieve by making Orb software open-source?
description: Worldcoin has taken a significant step forward by making its Orb software open-source. This move aligns with Worldcoin’s broader mission to democratize access to the global economy.  By releasing the core components of Orb software as open-source, Worldcoin aims to enhance transparency and verifiability. This initiative not only fosters community collaboration but also facilitates innovation […]

title: Ripple vs. SEC: Sealed documents set for public viewing
description: In the ongoing legal battle between the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and Ripple Labs, significant developments have occurred. These developments come as the latest in a series of legal moves that have captivated the attention of the cryptocurrency […]

title: Ethereum Price Faces $24M Liquidation Risk At Critical Level; Ethereum Success Mirrored By AI Altcoin
description: The Ethereum price plunged to $3,500, raising concerns of a $24 million liquidation if it slides further.
